Sarmentus cried. “You want no mask, Nor tragic buskins sor the task !³' Cicirrhus was not far behind In paying off these gibes in kind; Begged him to answer, when and where his Chain was offered to the Lares— “A scribe you may be; still, confess Your mistress’ rights are none the less! And where, now, was the motive, pray, incited you to run away, When good enough was gruel weak For such a scarecrow, such a sneak?'’ And so these knaves with antics wild Our supper pleasantly beguiled.
